name: Online Bike Shope
description: This is a versatile and user-friendly Shopify website. The specially designed Shop Page of This is ideal for showcasing products in the most attractive way. Not just Homepage or Shop Page, I use other inbuilt layouts for inner pages such as Explore, DashBoard Page in an equally attractive way. This makes it all easy.
features: A MERN stack web application with a dynamic services section.
Firebase Authentication and registration by email, password, and name
An admin can add a new service that will be visible in the services and can make a new admin
Has client feedback option. A client can tell us of his observation * Client Order Product and see All Order
Use React Router, Route will be private/protected routes and Use Context API

name: SD Travel Agency

use React Router
Route will be private/protected routes
Use Context API

the user can book any serves and show all booking and delete any item
